name: blusteringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a loud way that is intended to appear confident, but that may not have much meaning or effect: He welcomes us all with loud declarations, blusteringly polite. His memoirs are blusteringly detailed but ultimately reveal little of interest.
More examplesFewer examplesHe demanded blusteringly to know where his daughter was.Does he pose a real threat or is he blusteringly bragging as he has a tendency to do, without the ability to follow through?The orchestral music was blusteringly powerful but did not leave a lasting impression.
